name: Taco Seasoning (Pack of 3)
summary: Taco night never tasted so delicious! Wave adios to too much sodium and taste the fullness of this well-balanced blend of cumin, oregano, and chili powder – with a mild heat, it’s kid-friendly. Just add the seasoning to lean ground meat for a saucy affair that holds together while you scoop it into taco shells. Our only question – soft or hard shell?
